Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Champions , Inhumans , Young Avengers
Real Name: Kamala Khan
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
RALLY (2): Friendly Attack Rolls . When an opposing character within line of fire would roll a single d6, you may remove one of Ms. Marvel's RALLY dice to replace that die.
MORPHOGENETICS: FREE: Choose one. Ms. Marvel can use the chosen effects until you choose again. Protected: Pulse Wave:
*Modify defense +1, Tiny damage symbol
*Precision Strike, Standard damage symbol
*Close Combat Expert, Giant damage symbol.

Comments
November 10, 2022
DarkTortoise23
Her rally is subtle, but its easily one of, if not her best feature. It's not uncommon to get a 2 in an attack roll(especially if you have my dice luck) and still hit, so she can stack them pretty fast if you have a lot of attackers. She can have giant size whenever she wants, and theres no range listed on her rally, just line of fire, so if you're on an outside map or a map with no blocking terrain, she can still tag you with it from across the map and guarantee you fail hard at shape change, super senses, impervious, b/c/f, willpower, leadership, or the half a million unique single d6 effects characters like Reptil or Legacy Thanos have that make life annoying. Combined with how she's an excellent secondary attacker that can take her fair share of hits and cant be tied down, and she's an excellent boon to any of her teams at either starting line.
October 24, 2022
Oathful
A nice upgrade from her last appearance, for 10 points more she gets two extra clicks and a lot more options. Her lower cost dial is also a really nice tie-up/tertiary attacker, so either line works depending on what you need. I also like they switched out her Atlas keyword for Young Avengers, where is seems she will be the main frontline of the team. Most of what was said for FF Ms. Marvel applies here, except slightly better. Also that Rally dice is like a pseudo-Scarlet Witch rally from Empyre, which adds on to how good she will be. // Thematic: 9/10, Viability: 9.5/10, Fun Factor: 8/10, fairly balanced fun.
October 24, 2022
Goop
I like her, i do wish her standard size would have been a little better though. It seems like she will almost always be tiny or giant. Anyway being 19def and tiny will be incredibly hard to hit and you can switch to giant for a massive 12/4 swing or go for a Giant Reach + Quake which is always fun combo. Lot of options with her.
